conbody.p: The user interface domain elements are designed for documenting the user interface of a software program

dlentry.dd:
User Interface control
For example Click File and select New to launch the New project dialog

cascading a menu
Click File New to launch the New project dialog

Window title
Click File New to launch the New project dialog

shortcut
Click File New to launch the New project dialog. Alternatively press Ctrl+Nkeys
